JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: IAM Project Manager – IT Transformation in Banking
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
About the role:

We are seeking an experienced IAM Project Manager on behalf of our client to lead a key Identity and Access Management (IAM) initiative within a major IT transformation program in the banking sector.

In this role, you will drive IAM implementation, ensuring security, compliance, and efficiency across systems. Your expertise in project management, IAM solutions, and stakeholder collaboration will be critical to success.

Requirements:
  • Proven experience managing IAM projects
  • Strong knowledge of IT transformation in banking or finance

Apply now og reach out to Xenia Rosiak at xrr@capax.dk to hear more.
